Package peregrine.os

Operating system specific extentions including mlock, fadvise, fallocate, etc.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BaseMappedFile  
ByteBufferCloser A closeable which is smart enough to work on byte buffers.
curses  
errno  
fcntl  
FileMapper Facade on top of mlock/mmap that opens up a file, mmaps it, then mlocks it (optionally).
Linux Linux specific functions.
MappedFileReader Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources in the foreground via close() without having to wait for the GC.
MappedFileWriter Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources.
